title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that user can register successfully with valid email and password, and complete email verification process.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email, strong password, and other required registration details
Submit registration form
Check registration success message is shown
Access the email inbox and click verification link
Confirm account is activated and user is able to log in

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful using registered email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input registered email and correct password
Click login button
User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login failure message appears when login with invalid email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect email or password
Click login button
Display error message indicating login failure

title: AI Trading Assistant (TreadGPT) - Query Market Data
description: Verify TreadGPT responds to user queries with relevant multi-modal market analysis and personalized trading advice.

steps.description: Login to platform and navigate to TreadGPT AI Trading Assistant
Submit query requesting real-time stock analysis or trading advice
Validate that AI provides relevant market insights with confidence scores and supporting data

title: AI Predictions System - Accuracy and Response Time
description: Validate AI prediction models deliver stock predictions with accuracy over 85% and response time under 3 seconds.

steps.description: Request AI prediction for a selected stock symbol
Receive prediction results with confidence score
Measure response time is less than 3 seconds
Compare prediction against actual market movement to ensure accuracy exceeds 85% over sample set

title: Backtesting Suite - Strategy Testing and Analytics
description: Ensure backtesting functionality correctly executes user strategies against historical data and provides comprehensive analytics including Sharpe ratio and drawdown.

steps.description: Login and navigate to backtesting page
Create or load a trading strategy for backtesting
Run backtesting on historical data
Results display detailed analytics such as Sharpe ratio, maximum drawdown, and performance metrics
Verify results match expected calculations for test strategies

title: Portfolio Management - Add Positions and View Analytics
description: Verify users can add positions to their portfolio and see accurate, real-time portfolio analytics and risk assessments.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio management section
Add new stock positions with quantity, price, and date
Positions reflect correctly in portfolio overview
Real-time analytics update to show accurate portfolio performance, asset allocation, and risk metrics

title: Paper Trading System - Place and Track Simulated Orders
description: Verify users can place simulated orders with the paper trading system and accurately track positions without financial risk.

steps.description: Access paper trading dashboard
Place buy and sell orders with specified symbols, quantities, and limit/market order types
Orders move to filled or open state correctly based on simulated market conditions
Portfolio positions and P&L reflect simulated trading activity

title: Stock Screener - Filter Stocks by Multiple Criteria
description: Validate the real-time stock screener filters stocks correctly based on multiple user-defined criteria including fundamental and technical indicators.

steps.description: Navigate to stock screener page
Set multiple filters (e.g., market cap, P/E ratio, volume, technical indicators)
Apply filters and view results
Result set only contains stocks that meet all filter criteria
Check that filtering operates correctly with no errors on boundary or invalid inputs

title: Real-Time Market Data Latency
description: Confirm that real-time market data updates with latency under 100 milliseconds.

steps.description: Navigate to market data view or a watchlist with real-time price updates
Measure latency between market data update broadcast and UI display is less than 100ms

title: Price Alerts System - Notification Delivery
description: Ensure price alerts send timely and accurate notifications through email and scheduled triggers based on user-defined criteria.

steps.description: Create a price alert for a stock with a target price and notification preferences
Simulate price reaching alert condition or wait for real price event
Verify user receives alert notification email within expected timeframe
Check alert status updates correctly in the system

title: Advanced Charting - Technical Indicators and Pattern Recognition
description: Validate that advanced charting tools correctly display 50+ technical indicators and recognize patterns with AI assistance.

steps.description: Open charting tool and load a stock chart
Apply multiple technical indicators (e.g., RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands)
Indicators display correctly overlaid on price chart
Trigger AI-driven pattern recognition
System highlights known patterns (e.g., head and shoulders) appropriately

title: Watchlist Management - Add and Remove Stocks with Real-Time Updates
description: Check that users can add and remove stocks from personal watchlist and receive real-time price updates.

steps.description: Navigate to watchlist page
Add several stocks to watchlist
New stocks appear with initial price data
Prices update in real-time
Remove a stock from watchlist
Stock is removed successfully and no longer updates

title: News Feed and Sentiment Analysis Display
description: Verify that market news is aggregated and displayed with AI-driven sentiment analysis in a timely manner.

steps.description: Access news feed page
Recent news articles load with correct headlines and timestamps
Sentiment indicators (positive/negative/neutral) are shown alongside news items

title: Strategy Builder - AI-Powered Strategy Creation and Validation
description: Test the AI-powered strategy builder allows users to visually create trading strategies, define risk controls, and run validations.

steps.description: Navigate to strategy builder page
Use visual tools to create a new trading strategy including entry and exit conditions
Apply risk management controls and save strategy
Strategy is saved successfully and validates without errors
Backtest the strategy using the integrated backtesting engine
Backtesting results are returned with detailed performance metrics

title: Top Gainers & Losers - Real-Time and Session-Aware Updates
description: Verify that top gainers and losers list updates correctly in real-time and adapts to current market session.

steps.description: Open top gainers and losers page
Lists are populated with correct stocks based on price changes
Stocks update in real-time reflecting the current market session

title: Authentication Security - Password Management and Session Handling
description: Check that password reset, change, and session management comply with security standards and validate error states.

steps.description: Request password reset for registered user email
Password reset email is sent
Change password using reset link with valid new password
Password change is confirmed and user can log in with new password
Try injecting invalid inputs or CSRF attempts during login and password change
System blocks and logs security violations, preventing unauthorized access

title: Scalability and Reliability Under Load
description: Ensure platform maintains 99.9% uptime and supports over 10,000 concurrent users with appropriate scaling and no degradation in performance.

steps.description: Simulate 10,000 concurrent users performing typical actions such as market data query, trading assistant usage, and portfolio management
System response times remain within SLA limits and no crashes or timeouts occur
Services scale dynamically without failure

title: UI Accessibility and Performance Compliance
description: Validate all key UI components meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards and page load times remain under 2 seconds across devices.

steps.description: Navigate through all major UI pages and components using keyboard navigation and screen readers
No accessibility violations are detected via automated and manual testing
Measure page load times on desktop, tablet, and mobile under typical network conditions
Page load times are consistently under 2 seconds
